1.details:
1. Investigate why menu images are not displaying properly
2. Check image paths and ensure they are in the correct directory structure
3. Fix any broken image links in menu components
4. Add proper fallback images for menu items
5. Test menu image loading across different categories

2.details:
1. Debug cart state management issues
2. Fix add/remove item functionality in cart
3. Ensure cart persists across page navigation
4. Fix cart total calculations
5. Add proper cart UI feedback for user actions

3.details:
1. Improve profile page layout and design
2. Add user preference settings
3. Implement profile photo upload functionality
4. Add user activity history (orders, bookings)
5. Enhance profile information display

4.details:
1. Create dedicated account settings page
2. Add password change functionality
3. Implement notification preferences
4. Add privacy settings options
5. Create account deletion/deactivation feature

5.details:
1. Deploy application with all fixes and enhancements
2. Conduct comprehensive testing of new features
3. Test cart functionality with real user interactions
4. Verify menu images display correctly across all sections
5. Generate deployment report with new features documentation
